body:
Comment 7: 
Removing the ordering dependency seems to be the easiest fix. It seems to be just the
two cases described. Even if you play with the names to get the ordering you want, there
are still non-Go data segments interlaced that are best avoided.

The submitted CL does that.

However, the submitted CL's new test (race detector with external linking using os/exec)
fails on darwin/amd64 on the builder, though not on my laptop. Reopening for that fix.
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
